  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RiakFuture<List<BinaryValue>>, Future<List<BinaryValue>>

    public class MapReduceOperation
extends FutureOperation<List<BinaryValue>,com.basho.riak.protobuf.RiakKvPB.RpbMapRedResp>
    A Map/Reduce Operation on Riak. No error checking is done on the content type of the content itself with the exception to making sure they are provided.
